extension_description.message: Humusha umbhalo okhethiwe ekhasini lewebhu bese uguqulela kufomethi ethile.

turn_off_description.message: Inkinobho yokuhumusha izovela ngaso sonke isikhathi lapho kukhethwa umbhalo

turn_on_description.message: Inkinobho yokuhumusha ngeke ivele uma umbhalo ukhethiwe kodwa usengakwazi ukuhumusha ngokuchofoza isithonjana se-Pro Translate kubha yamathuluzi.

auto_switch_description.message: Uma umbhalo okhethiwe kuwulimi oluzenzakalelayo okuqondiswe kulo, luhumushele olimini lwesibili okuqondiswe kulo

target_format_description.message: Khetha ifomethi eqondiwe ezenzakalelayo, ifomethi ingashintshwa kuphaneli yokuhumusha

auto_set_format_description.message: Uma ushintsha ifomethi kuphaneli yokuhumusha, setha ifomethi ekhethiwe ibe yifomethi emisiwe

format_and_order_description.message: Izimo zefomethi ezingashintshwa kuphaneli yokuhumusha nokuhleleka kwesibonisi

translate_button_on_description.message: Inkinobho yokuhumusha izovela ngaso sonke isikhathi lapho kukhethwa umbhalo

translate_button_off_description.message: Inkinobho yokuhumusha ngeke ivele uma umbhalo ukhethiwe kodwa usengakwazi ukuhumusha ngokuchofoza isithonjana se-Pro Translate kubha yamathuluzi.
